subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: In a 49-page report, IndyCar said that the conditions that caused the accident Oct. 16 in which Dan Wheldon died were beyond any anticipated in tests before the final race of the season.
snippet: In a 49-page report, IndyCar said that the conditions that caused the accident Oct. 16 in which Dan Wheldon died were beyond any anticipated in tests before the final race of the season.
